word:
Part II--Tea and Coffee 

         The Stimulating Effects of Tea and Coffee 


                                       R. H., Feb. 21, 1888 
     732. The stimulating diet and drink of this day are not conducive to the best state of health. Tea, coffee, and 
                                                                           421
tobacco are all stimulating, and contain poisons. They are not only unnecessary, but harmful, and should be discarded if we would add to knowledge temperance.
